cause.description:
The Daniel Is Poor Foundation was founded in 2002 in order to provide Daniel Hernandez with money so he may purchase a wii and other items, which will bring him temporary happiness.
note: thanks to anyone who tries to donate but all this money goes to that "Save the Children" organization because I had to choose a non-profit org. to start a cause. But if you insist... http://www.pixelpoison.net/donate.htm thanksss :D
1. Daniel is better than you at handling money so you should give it to him.
2. Daniel NEEDS a wii, ipod, and ds lite.
3. Daniel being poor makes baby Jesus cry.
cause.name: Daniel Is Poor
